Description_lang: Reduces all damage you take by $m2% to $m3% for $d, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage taken reduced by $m2% to $m3% for $d, with larger attacks being reduced by more.

description_blz.en_US: Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce todo el daño que recibes de 20% a 50% durante 10 s. Los ataques grandes se reducen aún más.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz todo o dano recebido, variando de 20% a 50% por 10 s. Quanto maior for o golpe, maior será a redução.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert den erlittenen Schaden 10 Sek. lang um 20% bis 50%. Stärkere Angriffe werden stärker verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce entre un 20% y un 50% todo el daño que recibes durante 10 s. La reducción aumenta cuanto mayor es el ataque.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit tous les dégâts subis de 20% à 50% pendant 10 s, les attaques plus importantes étant réduites davantage.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce tutti i danni subiti del 20%-50% per 10 s. La riduzione aumenta all'aumentare dei danni inflitti dall'attacco.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снижает получаемый урон на величину от 20% до 50% в течение 10 сек., при этом чем больше урон, тем больше он снижается.
description_blz.ko_KR: 10초 동안 받는 피해가 20%에서 50%까지 감소합니다. 피해가 큰 공격은 감소량이 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你所受的所有傷害降低20%到50%，持續10秒，較強的攻擊削弱的幅度會更大。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你在10秒内受到的所有伤害降低20%到50%。伤害越高，减伤比例越高。
